oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Trucker Caps & Cowboy Hats on WIIT
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Radio stations; Roosters; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (blue and red on white) advertising Trucker Caps and Cowboy Hats, a country music radio show on WIIT 88.9 FM, the broadcast radio station of the Illinois Institute of Technology, Mondays from 12:00 to 2:00 PM with hosts Matt Cook and John Dorr. Poster features woodcuts of roosters and the phrase "something to crow about."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: jfk
